resources.string: meteocool is an ongoing effort to make freely available meteorological data useful to everyone.\n\n We process and aggregate data from different sources and try to visualize them intuitively.

We use a super-accurate forecast model (a so-called \"nowcast\") to predict the path and extent of rain clouds based on factors like wind, air pressure and lightning activity.\n\n Longer time-frames are less accurate, but in our experience at least the first 45 minutes are spot-on.
